tuv.seg: Case study: Taxation of Maternity Benefit
Cás-staidéar: Gearradh cánach ar Shochar Máithreachais
• Example 1: Ann is paid her full salary while on maternity leave
• Sampla 1: Íoctar a tuarastal iomlán le hÁine fad a bhíonn sí ar saoire mháithreachais
• Example 2: Sally is not paid any top-up by her employer while she is on maternity leave. Her Maternity Benefit is paid directly to her while she is on leave
• Sampla 2: Ní íocann fostóir Sally aon bhreisiú fad atá sí ar saoire mháithreachais Íoctar a Sochar Máithreachais léi go díreach fad atá sí ar an tsaoire
This case study shows how tax credits and bands are adjusted by Revenue to account for Maternity Benefit
Léiríonn an cás-staidéar seo conas a dhéanann na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim creidmheasanna agus bandaí cánach a choigeartú le haghaidh Sochar Máithreachais
Note that these examples do not refer to people who are jointly assessed with their spouse or civil partner
Tabhair faoi deara nach dtagraíonn na samplaí seo do dhaoine ar a ndéantar comh-mheasúnú lena gcéile nó lena bpáirtnéir sibhialta
Employees are entitled to a personal tax credit (€1,650 in 2015) and a PAYE tax credit (€1,650 in 2015)
Tá fostaithe i dteideal creidmheas pearsanta cánach (€1,650 in 2015) mar aon le creidmheas cánach ÁSPC (€1,650 in 2015) a fháil
Their standard rate cut-off point is the amount of their personal standard rate tax band
Is ionann a scoithphointe ráta chaighdeánaigh agus méid a mbanda phearsanta chaighdeánaigh cánach
For each pay period, they pay tax at the standard rate of tax (20%) up to their standard rate cut-off point
Le haghaidh gach tréimhse phá, íocann siad cáin ar an ráta caighdeánach (20%) a mhéid lena scoithphointe ráta chaighdeánaigh
Any income over the standard rate cut-off point is taxed at the higher rate of 40%
Gearrtar an ráta níos airde cánach (41%) ar aon ioncam os cionn an scoithphointe chaighdeánaigh
When the total amount of tax has been calculated their tax credits are subtracted from this figure to give the total amount of tax owed
Nuair a bhíonn an méid iomlán cánach ríofa, baintear a gcreidmheasanna cánach ón bhfigiúr seo leis an méid iomlán cánach atá le híoc a dheimhniú
When a woman goes on maternity leave she may qualify for 26 weeks of Maternity Benefit
Nuair a ghabhann bean ar shaoire mháithreachais, féadfaidh sí cáiliú le haghaidh Sochar Máithreachais ar feadh 26 seachtain
The standard rate of Maternity Benefit is €230 each week so a woman who qualifies for the standard payment will be paid €5,980 of Maternity Benefit in total
Is é an méid de Shochar Máithreachais €230 gach seachtain, mar sin, íocfar le bean a cháilítear le haghaidh na híocaíochta €5,980 de Shochar Máithreachais ar an iomlán
Revenue will reduce her tax credits and weekly standard rate cut-off point to account for the tax payable on her Maternity Benefit
Laghdóidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim a cuid creidmheasanna cánach agus a scoithphointe caighdeánach seachtainiúil chun an cáin atá iníoctha ar a Sochar Máithreachais a chur san áireamh
The tax due on the weekly Maternity Benefit (€230 x 20% = €46) will be deducted from her weekly tax credits and the total amount of Maternity Benefit will be deducted from her weekly cut-off point

Bainfear an cháin atá le híoc ar an Sochar Máithreachais seachtainiúil (€230 x 20% = €46) óna creidmheasanna seachtainiúla cánach agus bainfear an méid iomlán de Shochar Máithreachais óna scoithphointe seachtainiúil
If a woman does not have her Maternity Benefit topped up by her employer a refund of tax may arise which can be calculated when she returns to work (see Example 2 below)

Mura ndéanann a fostóir a Sochar Máithreachais a bhreisiú, d’fhéadfadh aisíocaíocht cánach bheith i gceist, agus is féidir an aisíocaíocht seo a ríomh nuair a fhilleann sí ar an obair (féach Sampla 2 thíos)

Example 1: Ann is paid her full salary while on maternity leave
Sampla 1: Íoctar a tuarastal iomlán le hÁine fad a bhíonn sí ar saoire mháithreachais
Ann is on maternity leave
Tá Áine ar saoire mháithreachais
She continues to receive her normal gross salary of €700 per week and Maternity Benefit of €230 per week is paid directly by the Department of Social Protection (DSP) to Ann’s employer
Leanann sí lena gnáth-olltuarastal €700 sa tseachtain a fháil agus íocann an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí (RCS) Sochar Máithreachais €230 sa tseachtain go díreach le fostóir Áine

Revenue will receive the Maternity Benefit details directly from the DSP, reduce Ann’s annual tax credits and rate band by the Maternity Benefit amount (see above for how this is done), and send a revised tax credit certificate to her employer

Gheobhaidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim na sonraí faoi Shochar Máithreachais go díreach ón RCS, déanfaidh siad creidmheasanna bliantúla cánach agus banda ráta Áine a laghdú faoi mhéid an tSochair Mháithreachais (féach thuas lena fheiceáil conas a dhéantar seo), agus seolfaidh siad deimhniú leasaithe creidmheas cánach chuig a fostóir
Ann’s revised weekly rate band will be €400.76 and her weekly tax credits will be €17.46
Is ionann a bheidh banda ráta leasaithe Áine agus €400.76 agus is ionann a bheidh a creidmheasanna seachtainiúla cánach agus €17.46
Ann’s weekly salary of €700 while she is on maternity leave is made up of:
Is éard atá i dtuarastal seachtainiúil €700 Áine fad a bhíonn sí ar saoire mháithreachais:
The company salary portion (€470) has tax, USC and PRSI deducted by the employer
Déanann an fostóir cáin, MSU agus ÁSPC a asbhaint ó chomhréir thuarastal na cuideachta (€470)
The tax payable on the Maternity Benefit portion (€230) is collected by the reduction in Ann’s tax credits and rate band
Bailítear an cháin atá le híoc ar chomhréir an tSochair Mháithreachais (€230) tríd an laghdú ar chreidmheasanna cánach agus banda ráta Áine
Maternity Benefit is not chargeable to USC or PRSI
Ní féidir MSU nó ÁSPC a ghearradh ar Shochar Mháithreachais
Calculation of the tax payable by Ann on the company salary portion (€470):
Seo a leanas conas a ríomhtar an cháin atá le híoc ag Áine ar chomhréir thuarastal na cuideachta (€438):

│Cáin iníoctha ar €69.24 @ 40% │€27.70 │

│Is é an cháin iomlán €107.85 – lúide creidmheas cánach €17.46 │Is é an glanmhéid cánach atá iníoctha €90.39 │

Example 2: Sally is not paid any top-up by her employer while she is on maternity leave. Her Maternity Benefit is paid directly to her while she is on leave
Sampla 2: Ní íocann fostóir Sally aon bhreisiú fad atá sí ar saoire mháithreachais Íoctar a Sochar Máithreachais léi go díreach fad atá sí ar an tsaoire
Sally is not paid by her employer while on maternity leave so the following applies
Ní íocann fostóir Sally í fad atá sí ar saoire mháithreachais, agus ar an ábhar sin, cuirtear an méid a leanas i bhfeidhm
Sally earned €700 per week (€36,400 a year)
Thuill Sally €700 sa tseachtain (€36,400 sa bhliain)
She paid tax, PRSI and Universal Social Charge weekly
D’íoc sí cáin, ÁSPC agus an Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch gach seachtain
Her tax and Universal Social Charge were deducted on the assumption that she would continue to earn the same amount for the rest of the year
Asbhaineadh a cáin agus a Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch ag glacadh leis go leanfadh sí leis an méid céanna a thuilleamh don chuid eile den bhliain
When she goes on maternity leave and starts getting Maternity Benefit she is no longer liable to pay the Universal Social Charge or PRSI (since these are not charged on Maternity Benefit)

Nuair a théann sí ar saoire mháithreachais agus nuair a thosaíonn sí le Sochar Máithreachais a fháil, níl sí faoi dhliteanas a thuilleadh an Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch nó ÁSPC a íoc (mar gheall nach ngearrtar iad ar Shochar Máithreachais)
She may get a refund of Universal Social Charge
Féadfaidh sí aisíocaíocht an Mhuirir Shóisialta Uilíoch a fháil

When she returns to work she will probably also get a refund of tax since while she is on maternity leave her tax credits are more than the tax due on her Maternity Benefit and she may also have paid extra tax on her salary before going on maternity leave

Nuair a fhilleann sí ar an obair, is dócha go dtabharfar di aisíocaíocht cánach, chomh maith, mar gheall gur mó a creidmheasanna cánach fad atá sí ar saoire mháithreachais ná an méid cánach atá le híoc ar a Sochar Máithreachais agus d’fhéadfadh gur íoc sí cáin bhreise ar a tuarastal sula ndeachaigh sí ar saoire mháithreachais
